Package alpha.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
alpha.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class handles most of the actual game logic. It is where the basic game loop is handled, while accessing the other classes for other uses, like lore and character battle. It is also where the band of characters are currently made. May move somewhere else.

  • Method Details

    • battlePhase

      private static void battlePhase(Player[] band, Enemy[] mobs)
      battlePhase() is used side-by-side with fight(). This method is where the players and enemies fight each other.
      Parameters:
      band - The group of playing characters
      mobs - The group of enemies the band is fighting against

    • checkEnemies

      private static boolean checkEnemies(Enemy[] mobs)
      Used to check if all enemies are alive, if they are all elimited, returns false
      Parameters:
      mobs - Group of enemies
      Returns:
      true if at least 1 alive, else false

    • checkStatus

      private static boolean checkStatus(Player[] band)
      Used to check if all players are alive, if they are all elimited, returns false
      Parameters:
      band - Group of Players
      Returns:
      true if at least 1 alive, else false

    • displayEnemies

      private static void displayEnemies(Enemy[] mobs)
      A specific method used to loop through an array of enemies, giving their particular stats. Important method as its how players will choose who to attack.
      Parameters:
      mobs - Group of enemies

    • displayPlayers

      private static void displayPlayers(Player[] band)
      Gives the band of players a proper visual of everyone and their stats. Very similar to displayEnemies(), displays HP, DEF, Name, and level.
      Parameters:
      band - Group of players

    • fight

      private static void fight(String location, Enemy[] mobs)
      The fight() method handles the main fighting logic. A band of players get looped through and attack a group of enemies. Following that, the enemies attack back using a random number generator.
      Parameters:
      location - Current location of the band. Most likely will move to Lore
      mobs - Group of enemies. Most likely change to 2D array

    • level1

      private static void level1()
      This method contains the current "First level" of the game. As of now each level contains "waves" and the band must defeat all waves to proceed to the next level. Progress is reset until next level.

    • Start

      public static void Start()
      Start() is essentially the main method, but is abstracted away for cleaner visuals.
